articles.title: Jets getting a taste of the Aaron Rodgers Show before he even commits - FOX Sports
articles.description: Technically, Aaron Rodgers is still a Packer. He's in limbo. And he's holding the Jets there, too.
articles.content:
Only Aaron Rodgers.
The Green Bay Packers quarterback is doing what he always does. Rodgers has always done things his way. And he's not stopping now in the final years of his NFL career.
